name: Overdoing It
description:
This is my entry for the Trijam #212: The 3 hour game jam 

Theme is "Too Much"

Additional Info:

To win, you need to reach the 100k Energy Collected without depleting the Energy of the world Crystal.

You will lose if the Energy of the world Crystal reach 0, or you overdo the clicking by 10 times.

I don't have enough time to balance the value of each upgrade, so I am not sure if the game is winnable :D

Hope you like it too, I am unable to do some polishing in game such description, and BGM. Next time i'll try my best to finish making the game.

Assets are from the Gdevelop Asset Store
